responses: 2: The ruling party or party leadership body (in a one-party system). (0=No, 1=Yes)[v2exctlhs_2]
citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
question: In practice, from which of the following bodies must the head of state customarily seek approval prior to making important decisions on domestic policy?
